attributes.action: Resume Covid 19 tests in all those with symptoms
attributes.background:
Resume Covid 19 tests in all those with symptoms.
We need to do this to help understand the mortality rate, assist those who are vulnerable to make informed decisions and,  most importantly,  to help slow the spread. The longer we can delay this, the more time to fine a cure.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
